page.title: 20Country walk: Kettering N.E.
page.content:
Kettering Borough Council has produced a number of leaflets entitled "If you feel like going for a short walk...". Number 6 is within our area and guides the walker through the lovely valley of the River Ise. Here the built up townscape ends quite abruptly with Grange Estate to the east of the river. Allotments and a wide open space lead to the river bank. This is in really stark contrast to the meadows and trees on the other side of the valley towards the village of Warkton.
The data for the block was collected by children of Kettering's Avondale Junior School with Miss S.Grimes, Mrs E.Cross and Mr.C.H.Jervis(Headmaster). Computer pages were written by Deena Wilson, Mirranda Abraham and Mr.Jervis.
